details.sectionContent: This event is based on technical skills, critical thinking as well as knowledge. A combination of fun and knowledge.
Fun based events with basic knowledge of technology. This event will test the basic knowledge of participants . Participants will also gain knowledge about some new algorithms.

This round will test the mental ability of the participants with a technical twist.
Participants will be provided questions of three different kinds.
Judging criteria will be based on correct answers.

This is also an individual round.
Participants will be given n x n grid and they are asked to mark queen in such a way that not a single queen will be able to kill all other queen.
If participants successfully solve the queen problem he/she will get another grid after being able to answer simple riddle.
Based on position of queen participants will scan QR code from which they will get letter to form technical word.
Judgement will be madeon basis of max words made by participants .

Four pairs of participants will play this round
Technical ludo will be there.
Going ahead based on question & answer.
Selected two will be playing final game.
